author: jing9
msg: HDFS-6018. Exception recorded in LOG when IPCLoggerChannel#close is called. Contributed by Jing Zhao.

author: jing9
msg: HDFS-6019. Standby NN might not checkpoint when processing the rolling upgrade marker. Contributed by Haohui Mai.

author: elecharny
msg: o Many changes in the RecordManager to make it possible to add new B-trees, and to insert values in them.
o The file layout has been changed.
o The write transaction is now implemented
o revisions are created and kept on disk
o Still not possible to read back the file, and the CopiedPage btree is not updated

author: angela
msg: OAK-1211: apply patch provided by antonio sanso
